params.text: We looked for something nimble and flexible, something that met the «just in time» need for employees that had work to do now. Enter H5P…
H5P used as training tool for 30.000 employees at University of Colorado.

params.text:
• Open source core
  • Mobile friendly
  • Move content between existing publishing systems
  • All you need is a browser
Check All Content Types
Over 40 content types

Insane quality

      74 % of users very likely to recommend (9 or 10 out of 10)
      No barriers on license, technology and distribution

As a plugin for existing solutions

      Makes faster adoption possible
      Shorter path to maturity

As open source

      Safe
      Others may plug it into their solutions
      Facilitates global collaboration

Strong growth

      Viral growth possible since the product is loved

Global community

      Higher Education in most of the western world
      K12
      Fortune 50 companies and other industry
      Big global training providers in the western world
      Military organizations
      Consultancy companies all over the world
      LMS’s and other learning tools

70 000+ sessions per week-day on community site.

All numbers are growing quickly!

74 % of all users is very likely to promote H5P to other users.

(Survey March 17 – October 19)

H5P is available as a plugin for most educational LMSs and major CMS platforms, representing over
63 %
market share and over
75 million
websites.

“The University of Manchester have developed a bespoke Learning Platform for their Medical Students using Wordpress. Called 1Med Learn, the system allows us to produce multimedia rich, attractive content available across multiple platforms. H5P is at the heart of 1Med Learn allowing us to create rich, interactive content that is ideal for medicine. Interactive videos allow us to test students on diagnostic principles. Hotspot images provide an ideal way of using clinical images. Timelines are a great way to display case histories. The University recently introduced Flipped classroom sessions into the medical curriculum and use H5P to prepare students by releasing a formative assessment the day before the flipped class. This allows students to test their knowledge and allows the school to monitor students' engagement and understanding. The results of these tests are published in a student dashboard, alongside the cohort average, providing a gauge of their own progress as well as a motivational incentive in a nod towards gamification of assessment. H5P is the only quiz tool that allows us to do this.”

~ Tim Cappelli, Learning Technology Manager, University of Manchester

“H5P has enabled academics and staff to create rich interactive media in an incredibly easy and accessible way. This is a brilliant way to build learning objects that we can embed in websites and our VLE. Its simplicity means we can concentrate on the teaching & learning rather than the technical aspects of development. Students are even creating their own H5P objects and sharing them with each other. We’re working hard to move to a blended form of delivery and H5P fully supports our aspirations for engaging online teaching.

~ Stephan Caspar, Enhanced Learning Production Manager, University of Southampton
Weekly presented by community in blogs and on conferences
H5P is supported by any Virtual Learning Enviroment with LTI support like:
If you would like to self-host H5P content, plugin for Moodle, WordPress or Drupal are available
